features.title: Tile map + resource generation
features.description: Render a deterministic world with generated iron-ore and coal-ore resource patches, including a no-resource spawn exclusion ring.
acceptanceHints: Resources are generated deterministically from a stable seed.
Spawn area avoids resource placement in the player's spawn clearance ring.
Map sampling functions reject invalid tile coordinates.

features.title: Miner extraction loop
features.description: Directional miner placement with tick-based extraction and ore emission cadence.
acceptanceHints: Miner placement requires valid ore tile under the building.
Miner only emits items in its facing direction.
Output cadence remains fixed in ticks independent of frame timing.

features.title: Belt transport
features.description: Directional transport across belt segments with deterministic fixed-step progression.
acceptanceHints: Belts accept upstream input and refuse blocked transfers.
No same-tick ingress and egress at a belt tile boundary.
Paused simulation does not advance item movement.

features.title: Inserter transfer
features.description: Directional pickup/drop transfer with ore and plate item support.
acceptanceHints: Pickup and drop sides follow current orientation.
Transfers execute on fixed insertion cadence.
Inserter movement honors available capacity and destination availability.

features.title: Splitters / mergers / conveyor balancing
features.description: Routing and balancing behavior for 1->2 belt branch flows with deterministic arbitration.
acceptanceHints: Splitter routes one item forward and one item laterally per cadence window.
Branch arbitration is deterministic when both outputs are available.
Stack balancing does not drop or duplicate items.

features.title: Furnace processing
features.description: Convert iron-ore into iron-plate and consume/produce fuel as configured by power rules.
acceptanceHints: Input ore is consumed only with valid fuel availability.
Output appears as iron-plate after processing duration.
Power usage and fuel accounting are reflected in diagnostics.

features.title: Chest entity + inventory I/O
features.description: Local inventory node for adjacent pickup/deposit and explicit player transfer.
acceptanceHints: Chest inventories can be opened and item moved.
Q/E flow uses adjacency checks and respects capacity.
Placement, pickup, and deposit operations are stable in world updates.

features.title: Assembler and recipes
features.description: Broader crafting content including gears and recipe-chain behavior.
acceptanceHints: Assembler entities can be placed and removed.
Gear recipe consumes input plates and emits gear items.
Recipe-chain progression remains deterministic.

features.title: Player controls and simulation loop
features.description: WASD movement, pause/resume, ghost placement/rotation, and fixed-step tick stepping.
acceptanceHints: Pause freezes tickCount, elapsed, and world state.
Step tick advances exactly one simulation tick while paused.
Rotation and placement behavior matches selected UI state.

features.title: Refuel action
features.description: Furnace-adjacent refueling using furnace output by player interaction.
acceptanceHints: F key near furnace output consumes one smelted unit.
Fuel bar updates and affects furnace readiness.

features.title: Power systems and energy budgets
features.description: Global power storage, connected/disconnected behavior, per-tick demand/consumption accounting, and diagnostics.
acceptanceHints: Producers and consumers are modeled in power graph updates.
Power diagnostics reflect active/inactive power state per entity.
Energy accounting remains stable under pause/resume.

features.title: HUD + rendering pipeline
features.description: Canvas rendering with interaction hints, player HUD, sprite placement, and metrics panel.
acceptanceHints: Renderer reflects entity states and placement previews.
HUD includes power/fuel/metrics and key control labels.
Top-level UI controls and interactions remain responsive.

features.title: Coal extraction and coal fuel loop
features.description: Add coal resources, miners, and furnace fuel pipeline from coal throughput.
acceptanceHints: Coal patches are generated deterministically.
Coal can be mined and delivered into fuel consumers.
Fuel requirement blocks furnace processing when empty.

features.title: Save / Load persistence
features.description: Persist full simulation state, player stats, and inventories to localStorage and restore deterministically.
acceptanceHints: Load restores entity sets, tick state, and inventory.
Save handles malformed/missing payloads safely.
Save/load preserves UI selection and simulation timing state.

features.title: Feature status dashboard accuracy
features.description: Keep docs and trackers synchronized with actual implementation status.
acceptanceHints: Feature tracker reflects implemented/in-progress/pending clearly.
Documentation avoids stale 'pending' claims for shipped systems.
Known limitations match actual remaining work.

features.title: Agent workflow tooling integration
features.description: Provide one-command smoke verification for agent-driven gameplay changes.
acceptanceHints: A single script runs typecheck, build, movement regression, and e2e smoke.
Strict mode exists and fails when required tooling is missing.
Documentation points users to the workflow command.

features.title: Keyboard shortcut accessibility overlay
features.description: Expose a dedicated, touch-friendly keyboard shortcut reference panel with keyboard and click access.
acceptanceHints: Shortcut overlay opens with the dedicated Shortcuts button and the K key.
Quick actions are available in-overlay for pause, stepping, tool clear, camera focus, auto-follow, and renderer toggle.
The overlay can be dismissed via close control, outside click, or K key.
Smoke coverage verifies overlay behavior and quick-action outcomes.
